DOC.brief_summary: This study examine change fast insulin , glucose , insulin sensitivity relate trait response 14 wk treatment omega-3 fatty acid , include fish oil ( n=25 ) flaxseed oil ( n=25 ) , Chinese gestational diabetic patient . Corn oil ( n=25 ) , rich omega-6 fatty acid , select controlled oil . The intervention start third trimester pregnant woman finish 4wk birth child . The investigator hypothesize omega-3 fatty acid could improve insulin sensitivity glucose metabolism patient .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Omega-3 Fatty Acids Insulin Sensitivity Chinese Gestational Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 ) gestational diabetes 2 ) female , < 40 year old 3 ) willing participant trial 1）type 1 diabetes type 2 diabetes pregnancy 2）Deny sign inform consent 3）Family history hypertriglyceridemia fast triglyceride > 4.56 mmol/L 4）Have severe liver disease , kidney disease cancer 5 ) Participating clinical trial within 30 day 6 ) Other disease condition , doctor patient agree participate
